footnote.login: By continuing, you agree to our

verification_code.subject: Verification code
verification_code.description: all you have to do now is to copy this code and paste at the time you get to access the application and the account will be unlocked :)

forget_password.subject: Reset Password
forget_password.header: You have requested to reset your password.
forget_password.subheader: We cannot just send you the old password, however, a link was provided for you in order to choose a new one, click on the link below and follow the instructions.
forget_password.description: If you did not request it, ignore this email. There is no need to panic, only those who have access to this email can ever change the password.

authorization.not_found: There ain't no authorization pending for this user
authorization.not_match: The informed code does not match.

authentication.error: Something went wrong during the authentication process.
authentication.not_finished: There haven't been found a response from the thrid party server.
authentication.no_callback: The authentication process is done, however, there haven't been provided any redirect resource.

forget_password.expired: The informed token is not valid or expired

login.not_exist: There is no user with the provided email
login.wrong_password: The provided password does not match

logout.error: Something went wrong during the logout process.
logout.no_callback: The logout process is done, however, there haven't been provided any redirect resource.

feedback.error: Something went wrong while processing your request
feedback.mail_sent: An email was sent with the instructions to proceed

error.400: The resourse that was requested cannot be accessed due to the current credentials state.
error.404: The page you requested was not found, it often happens due to mistypping but we might have moved this resouce somewhere else.
error.500: An error has occurred while processing the request, please try again later.

forget_password.remember_it: I've remember it! I'd like to go back.

password_policy.case: one uppercase and one lowercase letters
